recipesJson.name: Jack The Ripple
recipesJson.author: BRDZ
recipesJson.description:
NOTE:
FA MADAGASCAR VANILLA = SSA BORNEO VANILLA
HS FRENCH VANILLA ICE CREAM = SSA VANILLA ICE CREAM
FA RASPBERRY = SSA RASPBERRY SYRUP

Raspberry and Vanilla Ripple

This may seem over flavoured to some but here me out.
The ice cream base is primarily made up of 2, LB & SSA. LB VIC brings depth and mouthfeel as it sits quite thick whilst SSA VIC Is brighter and carries sweet upfront vanilla and dairy notes. Borneo Vanilla is sweet and very bright also and really boosts out a nice thick vanilla cream. 
VT Love runs out a nice white chocolate that pairs fantastic with the sweet raspberries that run threw the entire ice cream. 
I also added 0.5% berry boost from chefs to help the raspberry out also.
Been vaping this a few weeks now and honestly find this to be one of my all time favourite raspberry vapes.

reviews.text: Looks awesome BRDZ.  Wanna mix this up. I donâ€™t have any of the SSA. Can I use the OG you have listed? I have those at the same percentages??
